name: Croak.it
overview:
Croak.it! lets a user speak out his thoughts and emotions instead of having to type it out.

As they put it, the future is your voice, so why let a text box and 26 alphabets restrict the emotions, intonations, expressions that your voice can lend. So basically, wherever it is feasible, the user can actually use his/her voice to communicate. Each croak (as a voice stamp is called) is of 30 seconds, making it concise and NOT redundant.

Croak.it! has put out a webapp, mobile apps and bookmarks (a la pinterest) using which the users can start to stamp the web with their croaks from anywhere, anyplace!

Their flagship product is the API, which they see as the next generation solution for businesses to get closer to their customers. The API has been successfully tested in closed groups on trading sites, in educational tools and in CRM solutions. The final release is planned by December.

In the MVP that is currently available, Croak.it! has seen over 75,000 croaks recorded from over 26 different countries.
